name: .neon_sense
description:
.neon_sense is a 2D stealth game where you avoid guards to get to the final room. The catch? They're invisible, so you have to hear their footsteps to see where they are! The other catch? You can only use one sense at a time! 

Switch seamlessly between seeing and hearing in order to navigate the compound and avoid guards.

Navigate Main Menu and Credits page with the mouse.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Hold Space to listen for guards.

Esc to access the menu.
